## 几种布局
左中右 ， 中间自适应
```
 .main {
      display: flex;
    }
    .left {
      width: 100px;
      height: 100px;
      background-color: cornflowerblue;
    }
    .center {
      flex:1;
      background-color:darkolivegreen;
    }
    .right {
      width: 100px;
      height: 100px;
      background-color:aquamarine;
    }

```
